text: First go to Microsoftteams.com
and sign in to your Microsoft account.
If you don't already have an account,
on the create account window,

enter your email address and
click on the "Next" button.

Follow the on-screen
prompts to create a password

and enter your details
on the pages that follow.
You may be asked to verify your email.
Now, on the Microsoft homepage,
click here to download the app.

Open the downloaded file
and follow the instructions
to install Microsoft Teams.

You'll now be able to open
the Teams app on your desktop.

Download the Microsoft Teams
app from the app store.

Open the app and sign in
to your Microsoft account.
If you don't already have an account,
on the create account window,

enter your email address and
click on the next button.

Follow the on-screen
instructions to create a password

and enter your details
on the pages that follow.
Once your account is verified,

you'll be able to start
using Teams on your mobile.
